select PACK_BAR item_id,ITEM_NAME,NVL(BRDOWNER_NAME,'其他') BRDOWNER_NAME from ( SELECT PACK_BAR,ITEM_NAME,NVL(BRDOWNER_NAME,'其他') BRDOWNER_NAME FROM SCMR_ITEM_BASE WHERE EXISTS(SELECT ITEM_CODE FROM SCMR_EDC_BUSINESS_MONTH WHERE ORG_CODE='10000001' AND (MONTH_CODE=TO_CHAR(now() -interval '3 year','YYYY')||12 OR MONTH_CODE=TO_CHAR(now()- interval '1 year','YYYY')||12 ) AND SCMR_ITEM_BASE.PACK_BAR=ITEM_CODE GROUP BY ITEM_CODE HAVING sUM(OSALE_QTY_YEAR)>0 ) UNION all SELECT PACK_BAR,ITEM_NAME,NVL(BRDOWNER_NAME,'其他') BRDOWNER_NAME FROM SCMR_ITEM_BASE WHERE REGI_DATE>=TO_CHAR(now() -interval '12 month','YYYYmmdd') ) a where 1=1
and (item_id like concat(concat('%',#{search}),'%') or item_name like concat(concat('%',#{search}),'%'))
order by #{sort} #{order}
order by item_id
